alert.note: Alert for Craig; Nowata; Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 2:45AM CDT until July 13 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Craig County in northeastern Oklahoma... Western Ottawa County in northeastern Oklahoma... Eastern Nowata County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 245 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Chetopa to 8 miles southeast of Edna to 7 miles southeast of South Coffeyville, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Miami... Vinita... Fairland... Afton... Welch... Bluejacket... White Oak... Narcissa... Hollow... Pyramid Corners... Centralia... Centrailia... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 280 and 304. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
